channel.title: I need some help with colors
channel.description:
I need basicly a script that says like
Find color (####,####) Iffound SmoothMouseClick, true
or something like that, does anyone know one by like hearT?

item.title: I need some help with colors
item.dc:creator: @junior junior
item.description:
@junior wrote:

Yes, spiral just means it will search for the color or colors that are located the closest to the exact center of the cords, or the middle of the screen.

Read full topic

item.title: I need some help with colors
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

[scar]program FindColor;

var
x, y: Integer;

procedure ClickColor;
begin
if FindColor(x, y, 8388608, 1, 1, 1000, 1000) then
begin
MoveMouseSmooth(x, y);
Wait(200);
ClickMouse(x, y, true);
end;
end;

begin
ClickColor;
end.[/scar]

That should work.

EDIT: Junior got to it before me, either one should work.

Read full topic

item.title: I need some help with colors
item.dc:creator: @junior junior
item.description:
@junior wrote:

is this what your looking for…
its not a script but its a procedure to find the color that you chose or need to choose.

[scar]if(FindColorSpiral(x,y,COLOR HERE,MSX1,MSX2,MSY1,MSy2))then
begin[/scar]
thats for finding the exact color, but using this will work a little better.
[scar]if(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,COLOR HERE,MSX1,MSX2,MSY1,MSy2,10))then
begin[/scar]
This means it would search for the color with a tolerance of 10, you could increase or decrease it by changing the numbers.
And MSX1, MSx2, MSY1, and MSY2 are the cords in witch SCAR will look for the color for you.
MSX1, MSx2, MSY1, MSY2 will search in the runescape screen, or you can manually chose cords and that will look in the box you set the cords too.

and if you want it to look for more then one color just do this…
[scar]if(FindColorSpiral(x,y,COLOR HERE,MSX1,MSX2,MSY1,MSy2))or
if(FindColorSpiral(x,y,COLOR HERE,MSX1,MSX2,MSY1,MSy2))or
if(FindColorSpiral(x,y,COLOR HERE,MSX1,MSX2,MSY1,MSy2))then
begin[/scar]

Read full topic
item.source: I need some help with colors
